typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customerscloudsalesazure
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customerscloudstreamingazure
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> AddresseCloudSalesAzure
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> AddressesCloudStreaming
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customersvanarsdelsqlserver
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerFourthCoffee
Customerscloudsalesazure, AddresseCloudSalesAzure join(Customerscloudsalesazure@CustomerID == AddresseCloudSalesAzure@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CloudSales
Customerscloudstreamingazure, AddressesCloudStreaming join(Customerscloudstreamingazure@CustomerID == AddressesCloudStreaming@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CloudStreaming
CloudSales derive(Source = 1,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnCloudSales
CloudStreaming derive(Source = 2,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnCloudStreaming
Customersvanarsdelsqlserver derive(Source = 3,
		UID = uuid(),
		crDate = substring(toString(CreatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,10),
		upDate = substring(toString(UpdatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),1,10)) ~> DerivedColumnVanarsdelSQL
CustomerFourthCoffee derive(Source = 4,
		UID = uuid(),
		crDate = toString(CreatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD'),
		upDate = toString(UpdatedDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')) ~> DerivedColumnFourthCofee
DerivedColumnCloudStreaming select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customerscloudstreamingazure@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudstreamingazure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudstreamingazure@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate_Add = AddressesCloudStreaming@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Add = AddressesCloudStreaming@UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCloudStreaming
DerivedColumnCloudSales select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customerscloudsalesazure@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudsalesazure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Cust = Customerscloudsalesazure@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate_Add = AddresseCloudSalesAzure@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_Add = AddresseCloudSalesAzure@UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCloudSales
SelectCloudSales, SelectCloudStreaming union(byName: true)~> UnionSaleswithStream
DerivedColumnVanarsdelSQL select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		Source,
		UID,
		crDate,
		upDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectVanarsdel
DerivedColumnFourthCofee select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		Source,
		UID,
		crDate,
		upDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFourthCoffee
SelectVanarsdel, SelectFourthCoffee union(byName: true)~> UnionVanArsdelwithFourthCoffee
UnionSaleswithStream, UnionVanArsdelwithFourthCoffee union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomerWithAddresses
UnionCustomerWithAddresses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> trgCustomersWithAddresses

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate_Cust as date,
		UpdatedDate_Cust as date,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate_Add as date,
		UpdatedDate_Add as date,
		Source as integer,
		UID as string,
		crDate as string,
		upDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customers
Customers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustomers
DimCustomers derive(ActiveFlag = true(),
		RecordStartDate = currentDate()) ~> DimCustomer
DimCustomer keyGenerate(output(CustomerSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> CustomerSK
CustomerSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Team10Synapse

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp,
		StreamEnd as timestamp,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StreamingTransactions
StreamingTransactions derive(Source = 2,
		UID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnStreaming
DerivedColumnStreaming sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkStreamingTransactions
